EmailTemplate.name: 7_31_2014 VMUG Indy Post-Event.Email_use
EmailTemplate.subject: Indy VMUG: Thank You V-Much
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank You, Turbofriend.
We saw you in Indy, and it was awesome.
Thanks for chatting with us at VMware Users Group Indianapolis 2014. We wanted to send you some videos that show how VMTurbo has redefined the virtual ops landscape, improving the way that world-class organizations control and automate their virtual data centers. More Videos <http://www.vmturbo.com/resources/videos-main/vmturbo-videos3?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vmugpost> Downloads White Papers 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
